articles.title: American ex-priest Richard Daschbach in Timor-Leste found guilty of sex abuse, sentenced to 12 years in prison - ABC News
articles.description: In the first case of its kind in the staunchly Catholic nation, 84-year-old Richard Daschbach was sentenced on Tuesday, found guilty of sexually abusing orphaned and disadvantaged young girls under his care.
articles.content:
A defrocked American priest in Timor-Leste has been sentenced to 12 years in prison after being found guilty of sexually abusing orphaned and disadvantaged young girls under his care.
